dailyReport.summary: You showed strong de-escalation skills and active listening during this session.

metrics.name: Active Listening
metrics.feedback: Excellent use of reflective statements and summarizing the client's problem.

metrics.name: Tone & Language
metrics.feedback: Generally empathetic, but occasionally sounded robotic when offering solutions.

metrics.name: Problem Resolution
metrics.feedback: Took too long to offer a concrete step forward after acknowledging the frustration.
